00011 /*Fixme the following information might have to go to to the database*/
00012 /*Number of Shift registers in Fine Hcal Module*/
00013 #define NAHCSHREGDATA 12
00014 /*Number of Shift registers in Coarse Hcal Module*/
00015 #define NAHCSHREGCOARSE 8
00016 /*Existing Shift Registers in Coarse Hcal Modules */
00017 #define SHREGEXCOARSELO 3
00018 #define SHREGEXCOARSEHI 8
00019

00026 enum AhcVfeIntValues {kIntValVfeBoardId, kIntAhcVfeRecLabel, kIntVerificationData, kIntShiftRegisterDataStart};

00033 class AhcVfeConfigurationBlock : public LCGenericObjectImplExt 
00034 {
00035   public: 
00036 
00037   static unsigned int makeBoardID(const short crateID, const short slotID, const short boardComponentNumber) 
00038   {
00039     return BoardID(crateID, slotID, boardComponentNumber);
00040   }

00046   AhcVfeConfigurationBlock(int boardID) 
00047   {
00048     obj()->setIntVal( kIntValVfeBoardId , boardID  ) ;
00049   }

00052   /*Set Paramters of the board by which the data were taken */
00053 
00055    AhcVfeConfigurationBlock &  setCrateID(short crateID)
00056   {
00057 #ifdef VALUE_CHECK
00058     assert((crateID & 0xffffff00) == 0);
00059 #endif
00060     obj()->setIntVal(kIntValVfeBoardId,getIntVal(kIntValVfeBoardId) | (crateID << 16));
00061     return *this;
00062   }
00063   
00065   short getCrateID() const 
00066   {
00067     return (short) ( (getIntVal(kIntValVfeBoardId) >> 16) & 0xff);
00068   };
00069 
00070 
00072   AhcVfeConfigurationBlock &  setSlotID(short slotID) 
00073   {
00074 #ifdef VALUE_CHECK
00075     assert((slotID & 0xffffff00) == 0);
00076 #endif
00077     obj()->setIntVal(kIntValVfeBoardId,getIntVal(kIntValVfeBoardId)| ((slotID & 0xff) << 8));
00078     return *this;
00079   }
00080   
00082   short getSlotID() const 
00083   {
00084     return (short) ( (getIntVal(kIntValVfeBoardId) >> 8) & 0xff);
00085   };
00086   
00087 
00089   AhcVfeConfigurationBlock &  setBoardComponentNumber(short componentNumber) 
00090   {
00091 #ifdef VALUE_CHECK
00092     assert((componentNumber & 0xffffff00) == 0);
00093 #endif
00094     obj()->setIntVal(kIntValVfeBoardId,getIntVal(kIntValVfeBoardId)| (componentNumber & 0xff));
00095     return *this;
00096   }
00097 
00099   short getBoardComponentNumber() const 
00100   {
00101     return (short) ( getIntVal(kIntValVfeBoardId) & 0xff);
00102   }

00110   {

00126     AhcVfeConfigurationBlock(LCObject* obj) : LCGenericObjectImplExt(obj) { 
00127       assert ( _obj->getNFloat() == 0 );
00128       assert ( _obj->getNDouble() == 0 );
00129       assert ( _obj->getNInt() <= kIntShiftRegisterDataStart+NAHCSHREGDATA );
00130     }

00137     return *this;
00138   }  
00139 
00141   unsigned int getVerificationData() { return (unsigned int) obj()->getIntVal(kIntVerificationData);}  
00142 
00143 
00145   AhcVfeConfigurationBlock & setShiftRegisterData(int ipos, int ival) {
00146     if(ipos < NAHCSHREGDATA) {
00147       obj()->setIntVal(ipos+kIntShiftRegisterDataStart, ival);
00148     } else {
00149       std::cerr << "Warning Requested Shift Register ID exceeds " << NAHCSHREGDATA << std::endl;
00150       std::cerr << "Will not fill this value !!!!" << std::endl;
00151     }
00152     return *this;
00153 
00154   }  
00155 
00156   bool isCoarseLayer() 
00157   {
00158     if(obj()->getNInt() - kIntShiftRegisterDataStart == NAHCSHREGDATA ) return false;
00159     if(obj()->getNInt() - kIntShiftRegisterDataStart == NAHCSHREGCOARSE) return true;
00160   }
00161 
00163   int getShiftRegisterData(int ipos) 
00164   {
00165     if (ipos < NAHCSHREGDATA) {
00166       /*Check for fine layer*/
00167       if(obj()->getNInt() - kIntShiftRegisterDataStart == NAHCSHREGDATA ) 
00168         return obj()->getIntVal(ipos+kIntShiftRegisterDataStart);
00169       
00170       if(obj()->getNInt() - kIntShiftRegisterDataStart ==  NAHCSHREGCOARSE) 
00171         {
00172           /*Check whether this register is defined in the coarse layer*/
00173           if(ipos <= SHREGEXCOARSELO  || ipos >= SHREGEXCOARSEHI) 
00174             {
00175               if(ipos >= SHREGEXCOARSEHI) ipos = ipos-1-SHREGEXCOARSELO; 
00176               return obj()->getIntVal(ipos+kIntShiftRegisterDataStart);
00177             } 
00178           else 
00179             {
00180               std::cout << "The register " << ipos << " does not exist for this board !!! " << std::endl; 
00181               std::cout << "Will return 0" << std::endl; 
00182               return 0;
00183             }
00184         } 
00185       else 
00186         {
00187           std::cerr << "Warning Requested Shift Register ID exceeds " << NAHCSHREGDATA << std::endl;
00188           std::cerr << "Will return 0" << std::endl;
00189           return 0;
00190         }
00191       
00192     }  
00193     return 0;
00194   }
00195   
00198   void print(  std::ostream& os) {
00199     os << BoardID(getBoardID()) << std::endl;
00200     os << "Verification Data: " << getVerificationData() << std::endl;
00201     os << "Number of Ints " << getNInt() << std::endl;;
00202     os << "Coarse Layer " << isCoarseLayer() << std::endl;;
00203 
00204     for(int i = 0; i < NAHCSHREGDATA; i++) 
00205       { 
00206         if(i <= SHREGEXCOARSELO) os << "HAB(" << i << "): " <<  getShiftRegisterData(i) << std::endl;
00207         if(i > SHREGEXCOARSELO && i < SHREGEXCOARSEHI && !(isCoarseLayer())) 
00208           os << "HAB(" << i << "): " <<  getShiftRegisterData(i) << std::endl;
00209         if(i >= SHREGEXCOARSEHI) os << "HAB(" << i << "): " <<  getShiftRegisterData(i) << std::endl;
00210       }
00211   }
00212

00224   const std::string getDataDescription() const {
00225     return "i:boardID, i:VerificationData, i[0-11]:ShiftRegisterData" ;
